Nodes.NPCDialogue: (I have no time to ponder, I saw it, the army is coming...)
(... What good does it do for me to lament my fate here? No one can hear me. I will die for my sins, a pile of flesh that never saw beyond the stars...)

Edges.PlayerDialogue: (Yes... they are coming, but I am faithful, the King is coming too. I will guide us unto them.)
(Damn it! We just had to fucking live in this hellhole! Fuck this country! Fuck FUCK FUCK)
(I WILL die, but perhaps the rest of the flock needn't follow. Mayhaps after death I might see the unseen, at last...)
(Let's be real, I haven't seen the Sign in years. In front of an army, does my worship even mean anything?)
